t: Microsoft completes Bethesda acquisition, promises some Xbox and PC exclusives | The Verge
s: March 9, 2021 - Microsoft has finalized its $7.5 billion Bethesda acquisition. The deal means Microsoft now has 23 game studios producing Xbox games.

t: Microsoft Buys Bethesda And ZeniMax Media For $7.5 Billion
s: November 18, 2024 - The company has signed a $7.5 billion agreement to acquire ZeniMax Media, Bethesda Softworks, and their subsidiary game studios. These include Bethesda Game Studios, id Software, ZeniMax Online Studios, Arkane, MachineGames, Tango Gameworks, Alpha Dog, and Roundhouse Studios.
